name: GarbageDay
description:
Play as John Parker in Garbage Day where you face waves of monsters and try to survive in this stylized survival wave-based shooter! 

This game is in Early-Access so expect some minor bugs, patches will be applied through out the weeks/months.

Future addition goals:

  • Multiplayer
  • More playable characters with custom unique classes
  • more monsters
  • More Bosses and soundtracks
  • More stages to fight the monsters
  • A unique comical and action packed Story mode
  • Lots and lots of weapons
